extendedInfo.description: DealChicken hand-plucks the top neighborhood businesses and cultivates the best local deals. We deliver those deals straight to your smartphone so you can find the finest stuff to do, see, eat and buy, all at deeply discounted pricesâright in your own backyard. Features: -Discover deals near you or find deals in other cities -Explore Travel deals for a well-deserved getaway -Share deals with friends via Facebook, Twitter or email -View previously purchased deals -Redeem deals from your phone, no printing required! With discounts of 50% or more on local restaurants, salons, entertainment, travel destinations and more, DealChicken aims to help you uncover the hidden gems around town. Sure, there are other daily deal sites out there, but the DealChicken difference is this: Behind the scenes is a Gannett newspaper or TV station which has been a long-trusted part of the community. DealChicken first hatched in Phoenix in 2010, and is now live in more than 50 cities across the USA. Find the city nearest you in the drop down menu or sign up for Travel deals. Ready to get cracking? Download the DealChicken app.

reviews.title: Awesome app
reviews.comment: If you love a good deal..This is a money saver that you must have.
reviews.author: TOBOO M.F.

reviews.title: Deal chicken
reviews.comment: Love, love, love Deal Chicken!!! Awesome deals and easy to use. Big fan!
reviews.author: Vic Hawk

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: For some reason, I\'m not getting email notifications of new deals. The app is a great way to quickly see what\'s out there currently.
reviews.author: Holli Watson Hunter

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Great deals
reviews.author: Jackson Mergler

reviews.title: Freezing or messing up
reviews.comment: Every time I access the app now it says oh fiddlesticks and won\'t let me sign in or view anything.  Its not good bc I have deals that I have purchased and now can\'t get to? ??
reviews.author: stephanie florence

reviews.title: App is crap!
reviews.comment: I have installed this app three times & it never works. I bought a deal off their website & it wouldn\'t go thru. I am finished with this crappy app. The problem is I had to enter credit card info & not I\'m afraid I will get random charges. Going to try to delete personal info on website.
reviews.author: Tamara Bonshire

reviews.comment: Everytime I try to open the app, it freezes on my HTC 4G LTE. Uninstalled
reviews.author: Jennifer Anderson

reviews.title: What\'s wrong
reviews.comment: I have this app on my Samsung Galaxy II and it works fine, but when I installed it on my Samsung Galaxy Note Tab, it won\'t open. It says, \"encountered a problem and need to close.\" What is the problem?
reviews.author: Angel McGhee

reviews.title: Won\'t allow me to log in
reviews.comment: I\'ve attempted to log in with Facebook & standard, but I get an oops message everytime. What\'s the point if I still have to print up my vouchers from my computer. I\'ve been receiving my daily deals just fine but can\'t log in to purchase. I\'ll try reinstalling, but have very displeased. I was outside the restaurant when I first attempted to log in to pull up my voucher. Glad I wasn\'t finding this out after my meal.
reviews.author: Nitaz Golden

reviews.title: Good deals
reviews.comment: No harm in installing, but it has the same stuff as other deal sites.
reviews.author: Barbara Iles Bothe

reviews.title: Can\'t see my deals
reviews.comment: Used to be a good app, but today I can\'t see my deals and one of my deals can only be used today. When I try to see my deals, I just get taken to a page with deals to buy. Frustrating.
reviews.author: Anita Pere

reviews.title: Defective app...
reviews.comment: Installed it an it wont open, hum,need to fix it, coupon express here i come.
reviews.author: Barbara Walters

reviews.title: Not worth it
reviews.comment: I\'ve only purchased one thing, and that was a month and a half ago, I still haven\'t gotten it. There are very few updates daily. I too dislike having to print everything and then go to the company to check-out. It\'s time consuming. The deals aren\'t that great and it seems sometimes they get expired deals from groupon and jack the price up a bit. Almost everything on here I\'ve seen on groupon for cheaper. I\'m sticking with groupon.
reviews.author: Steph P

reviews.comment: Not impressed. Never use it. Prefer groupon and living social. Would like an easier option to buy...
reviews.author: Ronald Edwards

reviews.title: Deal cikn gr8
reviews.comment: Gr8 box in a dishes polka dotted set.
reviews.author: Angela Swanson

reviews.title: SPECTACULAR DEALS!
reviews.comment: I only put 3stars bcus idk abt cust svc yet as i havent purchased n e thing yet bcus i like to conveniently purchase fm my fone but i need a Nu fone to do that.. but looking @their deals it\'s like WOW!  I can\'t w8 to get a Nu fone i will definitely take advantage ;)
reviews.author: Miriam Schiro

reviews.title: Got to have it
reviews.comment: I love this site, it has everything
reviews.author: Tonie Mallard

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: It\'s easy to see what deals are going on in my area, as well will allow me to look nearby towns.
reviews.author: Alexi Dawson

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.comment: I like Deal Chicken immensely for my visits to Wisconsin, always great and useful deals.
reviews.author: Regina Harmon

reviews.title: Egggcelent! :-)
reviews.comment: I would recommend this app to anyone. I barely downloaded DealChicken on Monday, and I\'ve already bought 2 things and went bowling! Great deals!!
reviews.author: Hasani Watson
